name: Push ups
description: Keep your spine straight and just go for 30 push ups. It will make your chest look dashing.

name: Squats
description: Keep your back straight and just go for 30 squats. Very effective for thighs and glutes.

name: Deadlift
description: Put suitable weight for you and do 30 Deadlifts. It will increase your strength and back size.

name: Side Plank
description: Wanna have six pack abs? just do side planks. It will reduce your love handles fat too.

name: Running
description: Run to burn your stubborn fats as fast as possible. It is the best way to burn your fats.

name: Shoulder Curl
description: Wanna have a wide shoulder? Do 30 Shoulder Curls. It will change your overall looks.
